speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: Heigh-ho! An it be not four by the day,

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: I’ll be hanged. Charles’s Wain is over the new

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: chimney, and yet our horse not packed.—What,

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: ostler!

speaker: OSTLER
text: Anon, anon.

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: I prithee, Tom, beat Cut’s saddle. Put a

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: few flocks in the point. Poor jade is wrung in the

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: withers out of all cess.

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: Peas and beans are as dank here as a

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: dog, and that is the next way to give poor jades the

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: bots. This house is turned upside down since Robin

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: ostler died.

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: Poor fellow never joyed since the price

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: of oats rose. It was the death of him.

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: I think this be the most villainous

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: house in all London road for fleas. I am stung like a

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: tench.

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: Like a tench? By the Mass, there is

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: ne’er a king christen could be better bit than I have

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: been since the first cock.

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: Why, they will allow us ne’er a jordan,

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: and then we leak in your chimney, and your

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: chamber-lye breeds fleas like a loach.

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: What, ostler, come away and be

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: hanged. Come away.

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: I have a gammon of bacon and two

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: races of ginger to be delivered as far as Charing

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: Cross.

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: God’s body, the turkeys in my pannier

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: are quite starved.—What, ostler! A plague on thee!

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: Hast thou never an eye in thy head? Canst not hear?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: An ’twere not as good deed as drink to break the

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: pate on thee, I am a very villain. Come, and be

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: hanged. Hast no faith in thee?

speaker: GADSHILL
text: Good morrow, carriers. What’s o’clock?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: I think it be two o’clock.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: I prithee, lend me thy lantern to see my

speaker: GADSHILL
text: gelding in the stable.

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: Nay, by God, soft. I know a trick worth

speaker:
FIRST
               
              CARRIER
text: two of that, i’ faith.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: I pray thee, lend me

speaker: GADSHILL
text: thine.

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: Ay, when, canst tell? “Lend me thy

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: lantern,” quoth he. Marry, I’ll see thee hanged

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: first.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: Sirrah carrier, what time do you mean to

speaker: GADSHILL
text: come to London?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: Time enough to go to bed with a

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: candle, I warrant thee. Come, neighbor Mugs,

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: we’ll call up the gentlemen. They will along with

speaker:
SECOND
               
              CARRIER
text: company, for they have great charge.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: What ho, chamberlain!

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: At hand, quoth pickpurse.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: That’s even as fair as “at hand, quoth the

speaker: GADSHILL
text: Chamberlain,” for thou variest no more from

speaker: GADSHILL
text: picking of purses than giving direction doth from

speaker: GADSHILL
text: laboring: thou layest the plot how.

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: Good morrow, Master Gadshill. It holds

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: current that I told you yesternight: there’s a franklin

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: in the Wild of Kent hath brought three hundred

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: marks with him in gold. I heard him tell it to one of

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: his company last night at supper—a kind of auditor,

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: one that hath abundance of charge too, God knows

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: what. They are up already and call for eggs and

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: butter. They will away presently.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: Sirrah, if they meet not with Saint Nicholas’

speaker: GADSHILL
text: clerks, I’ll give thee this neck.

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: No, I’ll none of it. I pray thee, keep that

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: for the hangman, for I know thou worshipest Saint

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: Nicholas as truly as a man of falsehood may.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: What talkest thou to me of the hangman? If

speaker: GADSHILL
text: I hang, I’ll make a fat pair of gallows, for if I hang,

speaker: GADSHILL
text: old Sir John hangs with me, and thou knowest he is

speaker: GADSHILL
text: no starveling. Tut, there are other Troyans that

speaker: GADSHILL
text: thou dream’st not of, the which for sport sake are

speaker: GADSHILL
text: content to do the profession some grace, that

speaker: GADSHILL
text: would, if matters should be looked into, for their

speaker: GADSHILL
text: own credit sake make all whole. I am joined with no

speaker: GADSHILL
text: foot-land-rakers, no long-staff sixpenny strikers,

speaker: GADSHILL
text: none of these mad mustachio purple-hued malt-worms,

speaker: GADSHILL
text: but with nobility and tranquillity, burgomasters

speaker: GADSHILL
text: and great oneyers, such as can hold in, such

speaker: GADSHILL
text: as will strike sooner than speak, and speak sooner

speaker: GADSHILL
text: than drink, and drink sooner than pray, and yet,

speaker: GADSHILL
text: zounds, I lie, for they pray continually to their saint

speaker: GADSHILL
text: the commonwealth, or rather not pray to her but

speaker: GADSHILL
text: prey on her, for they ride up and down on her and

speaker: GADSHILL
text: make her their boots.

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: What, the commonwealth their boots?

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: Will she hold out water in foul way?

speaker: GADSHILL
text: She will, she will. Justice hath liquored her.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: We steal as in a castle, cocksure. We have the

speaker: GADSHILL
text: receipt of fern seed; we walk invisible.

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: Nay, by my faith, I think you are more

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: beholding to the night than to fern seed for your

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: walking invisible.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: Give me thy hand. Thou shalt have a share in

speaker: GADSHILL
text: our purchase, as I am a true man.

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: Nay, rather let me have it as you are a

speaker: CHAMBERLAIN
text: false thief.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: Go to. Homo is a common name to all men.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: Bid the ostler bring my gelding out of the stable.

speaker: GADSHILL
text: Farewell, you muddy knave.
